snippet: Borussia Dortmund scored twice in stoppage time to defeat visiting Málaga, 3-2, and advance to the Champions League semifinals for the first time in 15 years.
abstract: Borussia Dortmund defeats Malaga, 3-2, to advance to Champions League semifinals; other soccer news noted.
lead_paragraph: Borussia Dortmund scored twice in stoppage time to defeat visiting Málaga, 3-2, and advance to the Champions League semifinals for the first time in 15 years.
